itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor and Dan Hollaway bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with the passing of the stimulus bill in Senate, why a popular epidemiologist drastically changed his Coronavirus mortality model, why hundreds of CEOs re...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor and Dan Hollaway bring you the realest fake news of the week starting with the passing of the stimulus bill in Senate, why a popular epidemiologist drastically changed his Coronavirus mortality model, why hundreds of CEOs resigned right before the international shutdown, why Hank Johnson should not allowed to draw up gun bills like HR 5717 anymore and, how a pig lit a farm on fire in England.
